name: Fatal Paws Free Browser Demo
description:
This is the demo for Fatal Paws: A visual novel game with turn based combat and stat building. Preorder on Kickstarter!

Some actions and events may be delayed due to playing in the browser. Things will be much smoother in the full release.

You can expect to laugh and be surprised. 

- Dark Humor- 

- Tactical Turn Based Combat -

- Challenge -

- Mystery -

- Trust Building -

- Beautiful Art and Story -

- 2 Unlockable Gallery Images -

- A Lot of Blood -

Your cat comes with 5 different abilities to slay foes with.

Discover the truth about your cat.

To stay up to date, follow Fickle Sickle on Instagram and Twitter!
